content: to message me on ravelry if you run into problems with a modified repeat glossary st sts stitch stitches k knit p purl sl slip k2tog knit 2 stitches together ssk slip slip knit slip 2 stitches separately as if to knit insert left needle into these two stitches from the right and knit onto right needle p2tog purl 2 stitches together tbl through the back loop ws rs wrong side right side glossary of symbols used knit purl knit through the back loop knit 2 together twisted k2 decrease tbl yarnover sl1 sl1 as if to ptbl put both sts back on left needle and k2tog wendel page 6 leg chart version a leg chart version b wendel page 7 foot chart version a wendel page 8 foot chart version b wendel page 9
